string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's Second Assignment: Helping Beginner Adventurers
Looks as if there is another assignment for the #m102000000# Guard. Find out what it is from #b#p1040001##k at the #b#m106000300##k.

#p1040001# says that new Adventurers sometime enter the #m102000000# Warning Street Deep Valleys and that your job is to patrol #bDeep Valley 1, 2, and 3#k in Warning Street and help Adventurers if you find them.\r\n\r\n#y22529# #b(#u22529#)#k
You reported helping a beginning Adventurer to #p1040001#.

Oh, you're here! I have your second assignment. This time, it's even easier. Once in a while, beginner adventurers accidentally enter the Deep Valleys, which are the Warning Streets in #m102000000#. Your job is to help them. Do you think you can do it?
Okay, go patrol #bDeep Valley 1, 2, and 3 and help any lost Adventurers you find#k. Good luck.
Hmm. Let me know if you get more confidence.
You helped a beginner adventurer? Wow... You really are great! I doubt even #p1040000# could do better.\r\n#b#L0#Are you and #p1040000# brothers?#l\n#k

Nah, but we get that all the time, just because we have the same job and our names end in the same letters. Since our faces are covered, some people think we're twins. Actually, I'm a lot better looking than #p1040000#.\r\n#b#L0#(You want to check but you can't see through his helmet.)#l\n#k

Don't compare me to a rookie like #p1040000#. I'm much more experienced. That's why I'm stationed in #m102000000#, which is way more dangerous than #m100000000#. Hehehe. There was a time when I used to compete with Manji... Wait, nevermind.
In any case, good job. I'll call you again if something else comes up.
You haven't helped a beginner adventurer yet? There's bound to be one! Look carefully around #bDeep Valley 1, 2, and 3#k.
